attributes.action: ensure that every child under 5 on the 'At Risk' register attends weekly SureStart/Nursery sessions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The attendance of under 5yr old children who are deemed 'At Risk' of harm should be required on a weekly basis at their local SureStart/ Nursery.

The attendance of 'At Risk' under 5's will have many benefits as listed below:-
1) Children will be able to form relationships with other children in a 'normal' environment
2) Safety and security of the children will form the main stay of their attendance
3) Missed attendance will alert authorities who will then be able to act swiftly

The main benefit of this attendance will ensure that ANY SIGNS OF ABUSE OR FEAR will be immediately picked up and acted on!!!!

While this will cover many, many benefits it will act as an extremely cost effective oversee of 'At Risk' under 5's safety!!

Knowledge of the 'At Risk' status need not be disclosed to anyone but the SureStart / Nursery team leaders
